body_html: This is a mathematical property of batch norm - with 2 inputs, there aren't many options to force the first and second moment (you can have various signs and the effect of eps, but other than that it's +1 and -1).

body: This is a mathematical property of batch norm - with 2 inputs, there aren't many options to force the first and second moment (you can have various signs and the effect of eps, but other than that it's +1 and -1).
